NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Head Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 28, 2025, 17:20 IST
 National Highways Authority of India
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 28-Aug-2025 |  Delhi |  Salary : 150,000 to 150,000




FOLLOW

The National Highways InvIT Project Managers Private Limited (NHIPMPL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Head Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Delhi.

NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Head	01	B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering

NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 55 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 1,50,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the NHIPMPL Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee(if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

hr.nhipmpl@nhai.org.

Important Dates:

Starting Date	28-08-2025
Closing Date	11-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
